text:
The police have arrested three persons in connection with the suspicious death of a woman at Onnatti in Kotagiri. The victim Vijaya (22) was married to Karthik, who works in Tirupur, six years ago and they have two sons.

On Thursday, she was found hanging in the house. Suspecting foul play in her death, her relatives resorted to road blockade at Kotagiri. The Revenue Division Officer of Coonoor Geethapriya conducted an inquiry into the incident as the victim was married for less than seven years.

The police arrested Karthik, his parents Muniyandi and Papathi on Friday for their alleged role in the death.
title: Three arrested
